message:
Shibir brings out demos nationwide in support of hartal:

The student segment will not quit their movement until people’s demand is served and the farcical election is canceled- Chhatrashibir


Bangladesh Islami Chhatrashibir staged demos and processions in a peaceful way across the country on the 3rd day of the ceaseless shutdown called by the 18-party alliance. 63 Shibir men have been shot at and injured by the cops during the shutdown. 36 more have been unjustly arrested.

Shibir leaders said today while carrying out today’s agenda, “Awami League has gone mad after the one-sided and one-party election marking tremendous vote-rigging has been rejected within the border and beyond. In addition, the ongoing people’s revolt has upset its stance. This is why it is going on with its ever-known conspiracies to slide the sham election and people’s upsurge to an opposite direction. It is attacking houses of the minority people by strewing its party thugs and trying to shift the liability on the opposition men, especially Jamaat-Shibir activists. But the countrymen are not that stupid. The patriotic student segment will not quit their movement until people’s demand is served and the farcical election is canceled.”
